issue.title: [JS] How to implement two-dimensional array. Like pyarrow.array in javascript.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13863](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13863). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
How to implement two-dimensional array.

Like pyarrow.array in javascript.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13863?focusedCommentId=17471272) by Dominik Moritz (domoritz):*
Arrow JS supports list types. We are in the process of updating the API so I won't post an example for now.
